title: Coffee cake with coffee and walnut icing
ingredients: ['170g softened butter', '250g soft brown sugar', '100g plain cooking chocolate, melted', '375g self raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon mace', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '250ml strong black cold coffee', '4 eggs', 'For the icing', '450g icing sugar', '250ml very strong black coffee', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '300g chopped walnuts']
